entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
